solution_line_template: If a box of tissue has {packs_per_box} packs of tissues, ten boxes have {packs_per_box} packs/box * {num_boxes} boxes = <<{packs_per_box}*{num_boxes}={total_packs}>>{total_packs} packs
Since each pack has {tissues_per_pack} tissues, Annalise bought {tissues_per_pack} tissues/pack * {total_packs} packs = <<{tissues_per_pack}*{total_packs}={total_tissues}>>{total_tissues} tissues.
Annalise bought {total_tissues} tissues at five cents each, at a total cost of {total_tissues} tissues * ${cost_per_tissue} = $<<{total_tissues}*{cost_per_tissue}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
